name: Block Stomp DX
description:
Block Stomp DX is a minimalistic two player versus platformer game about jumping and stomping over your friend. This game can help if you have a beef with your best friend.

Music by:

Eric Skiff https://soundcloud.com/eric-skiff/

Jamie Nord https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX4SQvYS3mX-pGoix...
